citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, the facility representative did not have access to records stored off site and admitted to not
developing and keeping certain records such as a contingency plan. Failure to keep required records or inability to access
them at registered site impedes APHIS officials' ability carry out official duties. Each intermediate handler or carrier shall
during business hours, allow APHIS officials to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations.
Correct by 20 October 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
At time of inspection, the facility representative did not have access to records stored off site and admitted to not 
developing and keeping certain records such as a contingency plan. Failure to keep required records or inability to access 
them at registered site impedes APHIS officials' ability carry out official duties. Each intermediate handler or carrier shall 
during business hours, allow APHIS officials to examine records required to be kept by the Act and the regulations.  
 
Correct by 20 October 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
